creator: Sk1er LLC
description: Useful bundle of utilities for scrolling through tooltips, togglesprint, and a lot more!
Useful GUI related features, e.g a custom main menu, a custom chat GUI, custom report and reward claim GUI and more!
Displays every piece of information a Minecraft player could ever need.

creator: Moulberry
description: A bundle with some quality of life features, e.g a timer that shows when a TNT is going to detonate, popups for trade requests and more, levelhead, removing Dream skins.

creator: W-OVERFLOW
description: A bundle with mods that generally help PvP, such as sharpness particles, damage tint, and behindyou.

creator: Lily
description: Adds in-game updater for the mods in SkyClient.

creator: SkyClient Team
description: Adds cosmetics, a greeting menu, a custom loading screen, custom main menu, custom display icon and title, Discord RPC, and more.

creator: sp614x
description: OptiFine is an EXTREMELY lucrative modification that is required for most mods and practically all SkyBlock texture packs. It also adds an incredible amount of customizability options for Minecraft's graphics settings, from tree leaves to fog.

creator: Sk1er LLC
description: Patcher optimizes the game in every possible way, fixes 70+ vanilla bugs along with some QOL features while maintaining both compatibility, and has almost no tradeoffs.

creator: W-OVERFLOW
description: Stop crashes from closing your game and provide solutions!

creator: W-OVERFLOW
description: Hytilities Reborn is a Hypixel focused Forge 1.8.9 mod based on Sk1er LLC's Hytilities, adding tons of Quality of Life features that you would want while on Hypixel, such as an Advertisement-Blocker, AutoQueue, AutoGL, Height Overlay, Game Status Restyle, AutoComplete for /play and plenty others to discover on your own!

creator: W-OVERFLOW
description: Hytils Reborn is a Hypixel focused Forge 1.8.9 mod based on Sk1er LLC's Hytilities, adding tons of Quality of Life features that you would want while on Hypixel, such as an Advertisement-Blocker, AutoQueue, AutoGL, Height Overlay, Game Status Restyle, AutoComplete for /play and plenty others to discover on your own!

creator: CrushedPixel and johni0702
description: A Minecraft Mod to record, relive and share your experience.

creator: Aycy
description: A custom overlay on blocks.

creator: Salmon
description: Increase or decrease the hurtcam when hit.

creator: xCuri0, port by Mixces
description: Allows your mouse input to go directly to Minecraft, without any acceleration provided by your system.

creator: Sk1er LLC
description: Hides your nick on Hypixel.

creator: Biscuit
description: Essential QOL Skyblock mod with a plethora of indispensable (yet outdated) features, locking slots, timers, and a ton more to discover!

creator: ThatGravyBoat
description: SBH Focuses on enhancing the Skyblock HUD to feel like more of an RPG.

creator: Moulberry
description: NEU is the essential modification for playing Skyblock, featuring locking slots, fishing notifications, a giant list of every Skyblock item in the game, and an in-game wiki page renderer for the items in the list! There are many, many more features than these, and new features are always being added!

creator: DankerWanker
description: DSM provides dungeon puzzle solvers, a reparty command, custom boss music and more useful features to see for yourself!

creator: Sychic and Lily
description: Introduces some useful puzzle solvers, a reparty command, spam hider for Skyblock, and a ton more with lots to come in the future!

creator: BananaFructa
description: Apec provides a nice HUD improvement with a sleek blackbar at the bottom of your screen, making the game feel more like an RPG.

creator: Cow
description:
A collection of various features and enhancements mainly towards Hypixel Skyblock with other features like log searching, stalk, 
best friends list which are designed to be suitable for all Hypixel players.

creator: Cobble8
description:
A mod with a lot of customizability and has many features including auto teleport to Garry, disable mining messages, disable specific messages, 
and showing player's dungeons stats with more for the user to discover.

creator: Syeyoung
description: A highly advanced Hypixel Skyblock dungeons mod, with secret waypoints (technically, it shows you the best path to the secrets), and other things.

creator: _risk
description: Displays dungeon room id/name and adds waypoints for secrets.

creator: meyi
description: Mod for Hypixel Skyblock that helps with tracking bazaar sell offer and buy order movements.

creator: Sk1erLLC & W-OVERFLOW
description: 1.7 Animations, in 1.8.9.

creator: Shatterpoint
description: Allows the user to change the client-side time with a simple slider and full time customizability.

creator: CreativeMD
description: Make dropped items have realistic physics!

creator: tr7zw
description: Replaces the usually flat second layer of player skins with a 3d modeled version.

creator: tr7zw
description: Makes the cape wavey, similar to the Lunar Client cloth capes. The cape shouldn't be a static slab.

creator: Llamabit
description: Enables Twitch chat in your Minecraft with moderation options.

creator: ThatGravyBoat
description: Show your Spotify songs ingame!

creator: tterrag1098
description: Add a blur to all your GUIs!

creator: W-OVERFLOW
description: Customize the glint color of items and more!.

creator: Sk1er LLC
description: Adds sound subtitles to your game, as featured in modern versions of Minecraft.

creator: Kerbybit
description:
A framework that allows the use of JavaScript to create 'minimods' called modules which is required for SoopyAddons and DungeonsUtilities, 
an entire website with so many more at the cost of some performance.

creator: Moulberry
description: Allows resource packs to view the NBT data of mobs in Skyblock and provides the possiblity of changing custom mob textures with the use of resource packs.

creator: Aycy
description: Optimizes the resourcepack menu for faster load time and adds a ton of useful features in the resource pack menu!
Adds more options in controls menu to make it easier to navigate.

creator: Sk1er LLC
description: Accept or deny friend, party, and guild invite requests.

creator: ThatGravyBoat
description: Prevents Optifine from logging completely useless information

creator: ThatGravyBoat
description: Reward Claim is a mod to allow you to claim Hypixel daily reward in-game rather than leaving the game to go to the reward claim website.

creator: Lily
description: Adds a sprint and sneak toggle similar to that in Minecraft 1.15 and above.

creator: Sk1er LLC
description: Hypixel Autocomplete Mod allows you to autocomplete Hypixel commands to player names on your friends list, guild, and local players.

creator: LlamaLad7
description: Allows you to move the chat and makes chat messages animated.

creator: W-OVERFLOW
description: Chatting is a chat mod adding utilities such as extremely customizable chat tabs, chat shortcuts, chat screenshots, and message copying.

creator: ThatGravyBoat
description: Report+ is a Hypixel mod that improves their reporting UI to allow the player to stay on 1 screen rather than switch between multiple.

creator: canelex & powns

description: Adds useful GUI additions to the game.

creator: W-OVERFLOW
description: Allows you to look behind you with ease.

creator: Sk1er LLC
description: Displays WASD, left and right click, spacebar, sneak, cps, fps, ping, and more custom keyboard buttons on-screen.

creator: Sk1er LLC
description: Bossbar Customizer allows for customization of the ingame bossbar to your liking, including size, position, elements, etc.

creator: Sk1er LLC
description: TNT Time displays TNT's time until detonation.

creator: Sk1er LLC
description: Displays the Hypixel Network Level & other statistics of a player above their head, in chat and in tab.

description: Automatically say a selected phrase after a game has ended on supported servers.

description: A simple mod for Hypixel Network that provides a smarter `/reply` system, so you don't accidentally message a wrong person.

creator: SirDesco, Antonio32A
description: Hypixel SkyBlock QoL Mod. A collection of random mod features not to be found anywhere else.

creator: Moulberry
